pizzaProgram.constants
Class GUIConstants

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.constants.GUIConstants

public class GUIConstants
extends Object

Class containing constants used in various areas of the GUI.

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011

translateDeliveryMethod

public static String translateDeliveryMethod(String deliveryMethodString)
Translates an enum string from the delivery method column in the Orders table to a readable String for the user interface

Parameters:
deliveryMethodString - The string representing the enum value from the database.
Returns:
A string representing the way the enum should be shpwn in the user interface

translateOrderStatus

public static String translateOrderStatus(String orderStatusString)
Returns a string representing the value of the order status enum column in the database, as the way it should appear in the user interface.

Parameters:
orderStatusString - A string representing the order status enum field in the database
Returns:
A string representing the entered enum value, as a string that can be displayed in the user interface
